backend/main.mo: Defines core types for users, tasks, audit logs, and overtime entries along with comparison helpers for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record linking a rebuild-trigger feature to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-generated concise summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including chart and UI colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with a build-trigger timestamp comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Marker file indicating a forced rebuild with a timestamp and build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, and role‑based routing inside an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager-only detail view showing an assistant’s overtime totals, history, CSV export, and task habit metrics.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Scrollable assistant list showing overtime summaries and allowing selection for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with logo, username, theme toggle, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Displays overtime analytics for assistants using bar charts and summary components, fetching totals per assistant.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a line or bar chart showing cumulative overtime over time with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime, including date validation, minute input, comments, and submission handling.
Shows searchable, paginated overtime entries with formatted dates, types, comments, and loading skeletons.
Displays total overtime in days, hours, and minutes with a summary card and loading state.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Displays and filters the full audit log with search, action filtering, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Shows a modal dialog with a large preview of an evidence image for a task.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for completing a task with optional comment and image upload, including validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Modal showing a task's full history with actions, timestamps, and optional evidence image preview.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Manages assistants' task preference settings with selection, display, and updates of per-task preferences.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main task list UI enabling creation, editing, filtering, marking done, pinning, and deleting tasks.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders a task table with frequency‑based styling, image previews, and action buttons for editing, marking done, and pinning tasks.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Provides a dialog for creating or editing tasks, handling form state, validation, and optional task deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, overtime tracking, assistant management, and to‑do task operations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables, including color tokens for tasks and overtime.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑do tasks and overtime logging, fetching entries and totals and allowing overtime submission and logout.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and a branded welcome layout.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides the manager dashboard with tabs for tasks, team management, analytics, and audit logs, including assistant selection and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Shows a profile setup form where new assistants choose a username and language and submit registration.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Exports a helper that returns CSS classes for overtime cells based on whether time was added or used.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Contains utilities for computing on‑time metrics, formatting completion history, timestamps, and task preference labels and colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides functions to compute next due dates, labels, and urgency scores for tasks based on frequency and completion times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS settings including dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the app's high-level project state, including versioning, feature summaries, architecture notes, and known issues.
